snippet: When the news arrived on Saturday that Jean Stapleton — best known for playing Edith on “All in the Family” — had died, only a few gawkers came out to reminisce.
abstract: Only handful of fans make pilgrimage to Queens home made famous in classic television series All in the Family following death of one of show's principal actors, Jean Stapleton; people once visited house in droves, but passage of time and shifting tastes have reduced their numbers.
lead_paragraph: When the news arrived on Saturday that Jean Stapleton — best known for playing Edith on “All in the Family” — had died, only a few gawkers came out to reminisce.

headline.seo: Fewer Fans Visit ‘All in the Family’ TV Home
headline.main: Stifled by Time’s Passage, Fewer Fans Visit the Bunkers’ TV Home
headline.print_headline: Stifled by Time’s Passage, Fewer Fans Visit the Bunkers’ TV Home
